name: Ghillie Dubh
movement: 30 feet walking, 20 feet climbing and swimming
description: The Ghillie Dubh embodies the essence of good and is closely tied to woody environments, often seen as a protector of nature.
memorable: Its ability to alter perception of creatures in the forest and communicate with beasts and plants makes it a unique guardian.
goals: To protect its woodland domain and assist other creatures in navigating the forest.
relations: Often encountered with other forest-dwelling creatures, it may also serve as a guardian for enchanted areas.
environment: Forested areas, usually found in natural settings like woods and glades.
strengths: Strong perception, capable of stealth and advantageous interactions in forest environments.
weaknesses: Struggles against powerful foes due to lower overall damage output.
attacks: Slam attack dealing bludgeoning damage with moderate efficacy.
most_powerful_ability: Forest Knowledge allows manipulation of creatures’ understanding of the forest environment.
senses: Possesses passive perception of 16, indicating exceptional awareness of hidden creatures.
skills: Proficient in nature, perception, stealth, and survival, excelling in forest-related tasks.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and the poisoned condition.
Resistant to cold and radiant damage.
Forest Camouflage grants advantage on stealth in forests.
One with the Trees provides enhanced perception in familiar forests.
Can create a sapling-shaped sensor for reconnaissance.
test_queries: guardian of the forest with healing powers
protector creature that communicates with plants
intelligent celestial being in wooded areas
stealthy monster that influences survival in forests
